'''1.6.3''' is a major update to the [[launcher]] released on December 17, 2014.

== Changes ==
* Test launcher<ref>{{Reddit2|sub=Minecraft|id=2pkxpx|text=We need your help testing the new Minecraft installer! Again!|author=Dinnerbone}}</ref>
** Launcher for Windows now available as .msi, installs to the <code>/Program Files (x86)/Minecraft</code> directory
* First installable launcher.
* The installer is in <code>msi</code> format.
